# Mysticism (Domain)

**Granted Powers (Su):** Once per day, you can use a free action to channel your deityâ€™s power to grant yourself a luck bonus on your saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum +1). The effect lasts for 1 round per cleric level.

**Mysticism Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Divine Favor (Spell)|Divine Favor]]****:** You gain +1/3 levels on attack rolls and damage rolls.

**2** **[[Spiritual Weapon (Spell)|Spiritual Weapon]]****:** Magic weapon attacks on its own.

**3 [[Visage of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)|Visage of the Deity, Lesser]]:** You gain +4 Cha and resistance 10 to certain energy types.

**4** **[[Weapon of the Deity (Spell)|Weapon of the Deity]]****:** Your weapon gains enhancement bonus and special ability.

**5** **[[Righteous Might (Spell)|Righteous Might]]****:** Your size increases and you gain combat bonuses.

**6 [[Visage of the Deity (Spell)|Visage of the Deity]]:** As *[[Visage of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)|lesser visage of the deity]]*, but you become celestial or fiendish.

**7** **[[Blasphemy (Spell)|Blasphemy]]****/****[[Holy Word (Spell)|Holy Word]]****\*:** Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes non-evil/non-good subjects.

**8** **[[Holy Aura (Spell)|Holy Aura]]****/****[[Unholy Aura (Spell)|Unholy Aura]]** **<sup>F</sup>\*:** +4 AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil/good spells.

**9 [[Visage of the Deity, Greater (Spell)|Visage of the Deity, Greater]]:** As *[[Visage of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)|lesser visage of the deity]],* but you become half-celestial or half-fiendish.

  \* Choose good or evil version based on your alignment.
